MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL34 postcode of  Penmaenmawr, affecting properties in Mountain Lane, Craigglwyd  Road and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  2:33 PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of ongoing repairs on broken equipment on our overhead line network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7:30 PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:51 PM on 19th February 2021.
